game.name: Iconic
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Battle an army of merciless monster icons in this lane-based horde survival roguelite frenzy and put an end to their evil endeavors. By clicking.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Battle an army of merciless monster icons in this lane-based horde survival roguelite frenzy and put an end to their evil endeavors. By clicking.
